=Run Lobpcg using MS windows batch files=

{{{test1.bat}}}
{{{
rem Assume jar files stored in C:\JarFiles
rem set classpath for java
set CLASSPATH=.;C:\JarFiles\sparse-eig-01.jar;C:\JarFiles\mtj-0.9.14.jar;C:\JarFiles\netlib-java-0.9.3.jar;C:\JarFiles\arpack_combined_all.jar

rem Run Lobpcg tests
java test/sparse/eigensolvers/TestLobpcg
pause
}}}


{{{test2.bat}}}
{{{
rem Assume jar files stored in C:\JarFiles
rem set classpath for java
set CLASSPATH=.;C:\JarFiles\sparse-eig-01.jar;C:\JarFiles\mtj-0.9.14.jar;C:\JarFiles\netlib-java-0.9.3.jar;C:\JarFiles\arpack_combined_all.jar

rem Compile and run your own java class
javac MyEigenvalueCode.java
java MyEigenvalueCode
pause
}}}
